    API endpoints for fiat currencies. This category currently includes 1 endpoint:

    • Method Detail

      • getMap

        @GetMapping(path="map",
            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getMap(@RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.Long start,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.Long limit,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String sort,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false,name="include_metals")
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.Boolean includeMetals)

        Returns a mapping of all supported fiat currencies to unique CoinMarketCap ids. Per CoinMarketCap Best Practices we recommend utilizing CMC ID instead of currency symbols to securely identify assets with our other endpoints and in your own application logic.

        This endpoint is available on the following API plans:

        • Basic
        • Hobbyist
        • Startup
        • Standard
        • Professional
        • Enterprise

        Cache / Update frequency: Mapping data is updated only as needed, every 30 seconds.

        Plan credit use: 1 API call credit per request no matter query size.

        Parameters:
        start - Optionally offset the start (1-based index) of the paginated list of items to return. Default: 1
        limit - Optionally specify the number of results to return. Use this parameter and the "start" parameter to determine your own pagination size.
        sort - What field to sort the list by. Default: "id". Valid values: "name", "id"
        includeMetals - Pass true to include precious metals. Default: false
        Returns:
        A mapping of all supported fiat currencies to unique CoinMarketCap ids.
